Title: Earthquake destruction and the reduction of disaster popularization charts
Notes: "Earthquake destruction and the reduction of disaster popularization charts" (地震灾害与减灾科普挂图) is a 12-poster series published in 1992 by the National Seismological Administration.Entitled "Social Issues can not be ignored" (社会问题 不容忽视), this poster deals with the human cost of an earthquake: destroyed homes and schools, refugees, riots and plundering.
